com.isomorphic.jpa
Class EMFProviderCMT

java.lang.Object
  com.isomorphic.jpa.EMFProviderCMT
All Implemented Interfaces:
EMFProviderInterface
public class EMFProviderCMT
extends java.lang.Object
implements EMFProviderInterface

EMF provider for Container Managed Transactions (CMT).

Values from jpa.cmt.entityManager and jpa.cmt.transaction properties are used to locate EntityManager and transaction in container's environment context. For this implementation to work in /WEB-INF/web.xml should be these declarations:
To acquire EntityManager: 

  <persistence-context-ref>
      <persistence-context-ref-name>REFERENCE_TO_ENTITY_MANAGER</persistence-context-ref-name>
      <persistence-unit-name>PERSISTENCE_UNIT_NAME</persistence-unit-name>
  </persistence-context-ref>
To acquire JTA transaction: 
  <resource-env-ref>
      <resource-env-ref-name>REFERENCE_TO_TRANSACTION</resource-env-ref-name>
      <resource-env-ref-type>javax.transaction.UserTransaction</resource-env-ref-type>
  </resource-env-ref>

          Name of the reference to container managed entity manager.

EMFProviderCMT

public EMFProviderCMT()
Creates new EMF provider. Values from jpa.cmt.entityManager and jpa.cmt.transaction properties are used to locate EntityManager and transaction in container's environment context.

EMFProviderCMT

public EMFProviderCMT(java.lang.String entityManagerRef,
                      java.lang.String userTransactionRef)
Creates new EMF provider with specified context reference names.

Parameters:
entityManagerRef - String name of context reference to persistence unit.
userTransactionRef - String name of context reference to transaction.
